F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher::validateConfig (  ) 

Method to define whether the config is valid or not. If no, display a warning on the frontend. The default value is TRUE. This up to the finisher to overload this method

Reimplemented in F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail.
